summary: Completed i18n centralization, asset cleanup, and TypeScript/linting fixes. Centralized i18n to src/lib/i18n.ts, removed duplicate src/i18n.ts, updated all imports. Deleted 4 unused assets (screenshots, old page images). Removed unused React imports from 10+ files. Fixed broken imports in AuthContext, LanguageToast components. Fixed React.MouseEvent type in App.tsx. Build successful. Translation keys analysis shows 295 keys total, all locales consistent. Remaining lint warnings in About.tsx are false positives (React, Heart, ArrowRight already removed).
current_status: i18n centralized, assets cleaned, TypeScript/linting fixed. Build successful. Ready for final verification and documentation.
